```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(googlesheets4)

df <- read_sheet("https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1DjoLDaFy79_ntrRzA0dDEw-AdQHdYqsKo03x1fxVjew/edit?resourcekey#gid=138950618")


df %>% 
  mutate(
    abserror = abs(`Estimate` - (`Actual`*100)),
    log2error = case_when(
      abserror == 0 ~ 0,
      TRUE ~ log(abserror + 1/8, base=2)
    )
  ) 

 ggplot() + 
  geom_point( aes(x=`Graph`, y=`log2error`)) +
  stat_summary( aes(x=`Graph`, y=`log2error`), fun.data = "mean_cl_boot", colour = "red", size = 0.5)

p <- ggplot(df, aes(x=`Graph`, y=`log2error`, group=1)) +
    geom_point(stat='summary', fun.y=sum) +
    stat_summary(fun.data = "mean_cl_boot", colour = "red", size = 0.5)

fig <- ggplotly(p)

fig
```
